Blackjack.title: ♠ Blackjack Instructions ♠
Blackjack.text:
Try to reach 21 without going over.
Face cards are worth 10, Aces are 1 or 11.
Click 'Hit' to draw, 'Stand' to hold.

Solitaire.title: ♦ Solitaire Instructions ♦
Solitaire.text:
Build sequences in descending order.
Alternate colors.
Use empty slots wisely.
